channel.title: CVE Feed for The Ministry of Justice -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Ministry of Justice -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-27527|2024-08-02T12:16:35.682Z -- the%20ministry%20of%20justice -- shinseiyo%20sogo%20soft
item.description: Shinseiyo Sogo Soft (7.9A) and earlier improperly restricts XML external entity references (XXE). By processing a specially crafted XML file, arbitrary files on the PC may be accessed by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2023-32639|2024-08-02T15:25:35.747Z -- the%20ministry%20of%20justice -- applicant%20programme
item.description: Applicant Programme Ver.7.06 and earlier improperly restricts XML external entity references (XXE). By processing a specially crafted XML file, arbitrary files on the system may be read by an attacker.
